titlestmt.titleproper: A journal of cases and other medical facts and investigations 1834-1872
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: A journal of cases and other medical facts and investigations

scopecontent.p: Collection consists of medical journal, 1834-1864, of Benjamin Hornor Coates, M.D. In addition, there is a copy of a speech he delivered at the Historical Society of Pennsylvania for the inauguration of its New Hall, 1872, as well as several passes to attend lectures at HSP.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.

acqinfo.p: Provenance: Gift of Reverend Harold J. Schieck.
